original_text: In that day the Root of Jesse will stand as a banner for the peoples; the nations will rally to him, and his resting place will be glorious.
korean_text: 그 날에 이새의 뿌리에서 한 싹이 나서 만민의 기치로 설 것이요 열방이 그에게로 돌아오리니 그가 거한 곳이 영화로우리라

sentences.original_text: the Root of Jesse will stand
as a banner for the peoples
the nations will rally to him
and his resting place will be glorious
